unnormalised: Interesting moves in this transfer window. R. Sharma's move to Chennai FC for Rs. 50 Lakhs is quite a gamble. Hope he performs better than his last stint. The 25 km travel distance to the stadium will definitely help his fitness. Let's see if they recreate a "Chak De! India" on the field under Coach Banerjee. I heard it was a controversial move. Will be interesting to see if IIM Kozhikode does an analysis!
normalised: Interesting moves in this transfer window. R. Sharma's move to Chennai F C for rupee fifty lakh is quite a gamble. Hope he performs better than his last stint. The twenty five kilometer travel distance to the stadium will definitely help his fitness. Let's see if they recreate a "Chak De! India" on the field under Coach Banerjee. I heard it was a controversial move. Will be interesting to see if I I M Kozhikode does an analysis!
